name: Noonswoon, Inc.
description: Provider of a mobile based online dating platform to connect people interested in finding their matches. The company's online dating platform offer a multilingual dating application which screen users with profiles and connect users with their potential matches of similar socio-economic backgrounds, enabling users to download the application from the Apple Application Store and find perfect matches for themselves.
